resource.name: Demand Register FY 2017-18
resource.description: This dataset contains detail of vendor payments to date during the fiscal year.

resource.name: Active/Upcoming Extended Hours Construction Permits
resource.description: A list of active extended hours construction permits within the City.
columns_description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'West Hollywood Census Tracts' (kaxf-j9p4) the point in column 'address' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'West Hollywood Census Tracts_from_gijz_pqjd' (jwqj-rnuu) the point in column 'address' is located. This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Rental Buyout Tracking
columns_description: Agreed upon amount provided to the tenant by the landlord for vacating the premises.
Number of bedrooms of the unit subject to the buyout.
Address at which the buyout took place.
Average buyout amount received, by unit size and overall.
Date the agreement was signed off on by both, tenant and landlord.
Noteworthy stipulations particular to the agreement.

resource.name: Demand Register FY 2022-23
resource.description: This dataset contains detail of vendor payments to date during the fiscal year.

resource.name: Public Parking
resource.description: View listing of the City’s parking garages, lots and public valet stations.

resource.name: Citywide Traffic Volumes
resource.description: One of the City's ongoing strategic programs is to control traffic volumes, decrease traffic speeds and create safer walking and bicycling conditions.  In an effort to do this, the City regularly surveys traffic conditions.   This dataset contains the City's most recent traffic volume data.

resource.name: City of West Hollywood Catalogue of Enterprise Systems
resource.description: SB 272 requires that local agencies create a catalogue of enterprise systems used and that information be made publicly available on the agency’s website. This dataset serves as a repository of such data and will be updated annually.

resource.name: 2017-21 Five Year Capital Work Plan
